thread.title: Raleigh voted 5th-best city for 'Local Food Scene'

author: Rebecca Troyer
title: Raleigh voted 5th-best city for 'Local Food Scene'
text: John West Joule Coffee and Table in Raleigh, one of Ashley Christensen's AC Restaurant Groupâ€¦ more The votes are in, and Raleigh is No. 5 among the 10 cities with the "best local food scene," according to USA Today Travel. USA Today's panel of experts chose the initial 20 cities , which was narrowed to 10 by reader voting. Here are the winners:
